name: chuck-it
description: Chuck-it is a testosterone enhancing, moral boosting website that generates Chuck Norris Jokes at random.  Our  website pays homage to Chuck Norris, it describes his achievements and will make us "Chuckle" along the way

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin facts.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/facts.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html  && usemin martialArts.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/martialArts.html  && usemin movies.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/movies.html

author: Peter Torres
